snippet: Cecilia Muñoz, a longtime activist, was denounced after she joined the Obama administration and defended its deportation policy. But her loyalty appears to have paid off.
abstract: Cecilia Munoz, longtime immigration rights activist, was denounced after she joined Obama administration and defended its deportation policy, but her loyalty appears to have paid off now that administration is moving toward policy that includes path to citizenship for more than 11 million illegal immigrants.
lead_paragraph: Cecilia Muñoz, a longtime activist, was denounced after she joined the Obama administration and defended its deportation policy. But her loyalty appears to have paid off.

headline.seo: Cecilia Muñoz’s Perseverance in Immigration Push
headline.main:
Obama’s Defender of
Borders Is Again a
Voice for Migrants
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Defender of Borders Still a Voice for Migrants
